thread.title: Senate to House: Don’t Risk Upending Deal on Dodd-Frank Rollback

author: Andrew Ackerman
title: Senate to House: Don’t Risk Upending Deal on Dodd-Frank Rollback
text:
WASHINGTON—Senators are pressing House lawmakers not to jeopardize what they see as their best opportunity to ease postcrisis financial regulations, urging them to quickly pass bipartisan Senate legislation without making changes, people familiar with the discussions said.
Senate Banking Committee members in private meetings have said there is little political appetite in the Senate to vote on a revised version of the legislation. House lawmakers are reviewing the bill, which passed the Senate last week 67-31, and deciding...
